title: Say Hello to the Newest Virto SharePoint Kanban
text:
VirtoSoftware releases a new version of Virto SharePoint Kanban Board for SharePoint 2013 and SharePoint Online. This SharePoint task management software is fully charged with great new features.
 LOS ANGELES, CA, September 14, A Kanban board known also as Agile Board is one of the most popular tools for visualizing work, tracking and sharing progress and reducing waste by setting work-in-progress limits. The Kanban system is a virtual board with columns with cards or sticky notes. Each card splits work into pieces and each column represents steps in a workflow.
Virto SharePoint Kanban Board offers ultimate flexibility and efficiency, a user can easily customize SharePoint Kanban to suit their own business process.
Color-coded task cards with special markers.
Use custom colors for different task or task marker conditions. For example, red marker informs the task is overdue.
Drag and drop task within customized columns and swimlanes.
With Virto SharePoint Kanban, users can break every step of the work process into a series of tasks, and support every process flow with swimlanes, which can visually distinguish priority or responsibility of sub-processes as well as easily manage tasks between columns and rows with a simple drag-and-drop system.
Task filters.
SharePoint Kanban allows users to easily sort and group data. Create and apply condition filters such as priority, status, user assignment, project, etc. Additionally, the condition field has an autocomplete option.
Total option.
Virto SharePoint Kanban Board is able to aggregate data for columns with Total function (sum/average values). This can be used, for instance, when a task has "Hours" field, which measures the time required for task closing.
Flexible permissions to the tasks.
Using SharePoint Kanban Board, a user can define the permission list and control who can view, edit or manage tasks.
Download and try a free trial of SharePoint Scrum Board and explore all of its features.
Learn more about SharePoint Kanban Board web part and app and find out the full range of useful Virto SharePoint components at www.virtosoftware.com
Pricing and Availability
Virto SharePoint Kanban Board web part is available for SharePoint 2013 and the Kanban App version is available for SharePoint Online as part of Office 365.
Further information about the product and a free trial can be found at virtosoftware.com.
